articles.title: These Guys Hacked AirPods to Give Their Grandmas Hearing Aids - WIRED
articles.description: Three technologists in India used a homemade Faraday cage and a microwave oven to get around Apple’s location blocks.
articles.content: The group members, who have a mix of hardware and software skills and first detailed their hack as part of a technology collective called Lagrange Point, say a couple of dozen people have contacted t… [+2131 chars]

articles.title: Supreme Court seems likely to allow class action to proceed against tech company Nvidia - The Associated Press
articles.description: The Supreme Court seems likely to keep alive a class-action lawsuit accusing Nvidia of misleading investors about its dependence on selling computer chips for the mining of volatile cryptocurrency. The justices heard arguments Wednesday in the tech company’s …
